Reviews.Title: Made to order
Reviews.Author: R. Worthington Jr. "record man"
Reviews.Content: We just recently installed a swann security system. The wires had to be run a good distance. These wires were easy to work withand the connection was a snap. The clarity from the camera is great. They are also fireproof as they run through the walls. Well made. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Stone
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these cables.  Good, thick, well built cables.  Major improvement over the manufacturer supplied cables!  I just order 2 100ft cables.  If you're going to spend all that time and sweat pulling cables, do it with good quality, shielded and fire rated cables.

Reviews.Title: SWANN FIRE RATED BNC EXTENSION CABLE
Reviews.Author: TAYLOE7
Reviews.Content: SWANN FIRE RATED BNC EXTENSION CABLE. THE ELECTRICIAN SAID THIS WAS THE BEST KIND TO PURCHASE. HE USED IT WITH INSTALLING A CAMERA SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Robert Lorenzo
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cables because of their high quality materials and mainly because I needed them in white. I am waiting on some other parts to arrive in the mail in order to proceed with the installation. Thank you for making them available in this color and high quality

Reviews.Title: Great extension cables
Reviews.Author: Evelyn M. Spears
Reviews.Content: I need these cables to compete my security camera installment and am very pleased with the quality.  I got them at a good price and fast delivery.
